content.full_text: William A. Richardson and Abraham Lincoln to James K. Polk, 8 December 18471
paragraphs: William A. Richardson and Abraham Lincoln to James K. Polk, 8 December 18471

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincoln wrote and signed the letter. William A. Richardson signed his own
                  name only.

2The accompanying letters have not been located. It does not appear that Thomas Graham,
                  Jr.  received a commission.
